Ephesians__03.1: For this cause, I Paul, the prisoner of Jesus Christ, for you Gentiles;
Ephesians__03.2: If yet you have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me towards you:
Ephesians__03.3: How that, according to revelation, the mystery has been made known to me, as I have written above in a few words;
Ephesians__03.4: As you reading, may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ,
Ephesians__03.5: Which in other generations was not known to the sons of men, as it is now revealed to his holy apostles and prophets in the Spirit:
Ephesians__03.6: That the Gentiles should be fellow heirs, and of the same body, and co-partners of his promise in Christ Jesus, by the gospel:
Ephesians__03.7: Of which I am made a minister, according to the gift of the grace of God, which is given to me according to the operation of his power:
Ephesians__03.8: To me, the least of all the saints, is given this grace, to preach among the Gentiles, the unsearchable riches of Christ,
Ephesians__03.9: And to enlighten all men, that they may see what is the dispensation of the mystery which hath been hidden from eternity in God, who created all things:
Ephesians__03.10: That the manifold wisdom of God may be made known to the principalities and powers in heavenly places through the church,
Ephesians__03.11: According to the eternal purpose, which he made, in Christ Jesus our Lord:
Ephesians__03.12: In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him.
Ephesians__03.13: Wherefore I pray you not to faint at my tribulations for you, which is your glory.
Ephesians__03.14: For this cause I bow my knees to the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ,

               </u>in heaven and earth is named,
Ephesians__03.16: That he would grant you, according to the riches of his glory, to be strengthened by his Spirit with might unto the inward man,
Ephesians__03.17: That Christ may dwell by faith in your hearts; that being rooted and founded in charity,
Ephesians__03.18: You may be able to comprehend, with all the saints, what is the breadth, and length, and height, and depth:
Ephesians__03.19: To know also the charity of Christ, which surpasseth all knowledge, that you may be filled unto all the fulness of God.
Ephesians__03.20: Now to him who is able to do all things more abundantly than we desire or understand, according to the power that worketh in us;
Ephesians__03.21: To him be glory in the church, and in Christ Jesus unto all generations, world without end. Amen.
